about_the_game:
EMBRACE THE CHAOS in Leeroy, an uproarious VR mini-game extravaganza where the rules keep changing, the chaos keeps unfolding and nothing makes any sense!

Dive into over 100 brilliant, bizarre and baffling challenges: Pelt a peasant with tomatoes! Rewrite the laws of physics! Race with space cats! Make coffee for a dog!



Play solo, collaborate, or go head to head with friends via online multiplayer. Can you climb your way to the top of the Lee-derboard?



Combining high-tech gaming with low-brow humour, Leeroy is a chaotic delight that’ll keep you on your toes right up to the final bell!

Featuring:

Over 100 increasingly ridiculous minigames!
Dogs! Cats! Squirrels! Spaceships!
Constantly shifting rules and scenarios!
Enjoy solo or play with friends via online multiplayer!
Intuitive controls to help you navigate absurd challenges!

Prepare for endless laughs and surprises in Leeroy, where chaos and fun go hand in hand!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4GB RAM) / AMD 400 Series Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta headsets and Valve Index only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 series/AMD Radeon RX 6000 series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta headsets and Valve Index only

short_description: Embrace the chaos in over 100 ridiculous VR mini games to play solo or online with up to 8 people! The rules keep changing and nothing makes any sense! Leeroy!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
